ohhhhhh, sure hope you're feeling better asap, Valerie :(

goodness, I appreciate you sending the website, thanks ... it's always fun
to be *enlightened* :)
Pris
WARNING: I cannot be help responsible for the above, as apparently my cats
have learned how to type ...
